job_description:
About the job
We are seeking a curious, dynamic and passionate individual to join our team as a Lead Solution Architect & AI / Data Innovator. This role will be responsible for designing, implementing, and delivering RAG (Real-time Adaptive Generation) and AI agent solutions utilizing enterprise data that not only solve business challenges but also drive significant value for our clients. You will be trusted for explaining the value proposition and technical differentiators of our products to customers, understanding their requirements, showing insightful demos, running successful POC’s (proof of concepts) and deployments and helping to drive revenue for the company.

About Us:

We are changing the game on how Enterprise AI-powered applications are built and offered to fortune 5000 global enterprises. We are combining both cutting-edge advancements in machine learning and cloud systems to highly-researched, high-value products for the enterprise. 

Job Summary:

As the Lead Solution Architect & AI Innovator, you will work closely with cross-functional teams to understand client needs and develop tailored AI-driven solutions. You will be responsible for building robust RAG and AI agent platforms using cutting-edge technologies.



Key Responsibilities:

Work collaboratively with business stakeholders to identify opportunities where advanced AI can add significant value.
Collaborate closely with product development teams to design scalable solutions that meet the needs of our clients.
Develop and maintain RAG models that enable real-time adaptive generation of content based on user queries, preferences, and historical data.
Design and implement AI agents for tasks such as customer service, sales support, and strategic planning.
Lead Proof of Concept efforts, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to quality standards.
Continuously improve existing solutions by incorporating new technologies and methodologies.
Contribute to the development of internal documentation and guidelines on RAG and AI agent best practices.


Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Advanced degrees are preferred.
7+ years of experience as a Solution Architect/Technical Consultant in the IT industry with a focus on Data and AI solutions.
Exceptional understanding of enterprise applications, data systems, SAAS, Networking and Authentication techniques. 
Strong understanding of compliance, privacy and security of data
Proven track record of successfully leading enterprise complex projects from planning through implementation and beyond.
Demonstrated experience with Enterprise Data Catalog Products or Enterprise Data Observability platforms.
Strong understanding of RAG models and machine learning principles is essential.
Experience in designing, developing, and implementing AI agents for business applications.
Solid experience working with Linux, Python, JSON, YAML is a must. 
Excellent communication skills; ability to articulate technical ideas clearly to non-technical stakeholders.
Ability to work well under pressure while meeting tight deadlines and managing multiple projects simultaneously.


What We Offer:

A dynamic and fast-paced environment where you can make a meaningful impact.
Opportunities for professional growth and development through innovative solutions.
Competitive salary package, comprehensive benefits, stock options, and more.
An inclusive culture that values diversity and encourages collaboration across teams.
Application Instructions:

Please submit your resume along with a cover letter detailing how you meet the requirements of this role. Please make sure to mention “Lead Solution Architect & AI Innovator” in the subject line of the email. We appreciate your interest and look forward to reviewing your application.
raw_analysis:
### Detailed Analysis and Recommendations for Tailoring the Resume

#### 1. Key Requirements and Qualifications from the Job Description
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field; advanced degrees preferred.
- 7+ years of experience as a Solution Architect/Technical Consultant in IT with a focus on Data and AI solutions.
- Proven track record of leading complex enterprise projects.
- Experience with Enterprise Data Catalog Products or Enterprise Data Observability platforms.
- Strong understanding of RAG models and machine learning principles.
- Experience in designing, developing, and implementing AI agents for business applications.

#### 2. Technical Skills and Tools Required
- Proficiency in Linux, Python, JSON, YAML.
- Understanding of enterprise applications, data systems, SAAS, Networking, and Authentication techniques.
- Knowledge of compliance, privacy, and security of data.

#### 3. Soft Skills Emphasized
- Excellent communication skills for articulating technical ideas to non-technical stakeholders.
- Ability to work well under pressure, meet tight deadlines, and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

#### 4. Industry-Specific Terminology and Keywords
- RAG (Real-time Adaptive Generation)
- AI agent solutions
- Enterprise Data Catalog
- Data Observability
- Machine Learning
- Proof of Concepts (POC)
- Cross-functional teams

#### 5. Company Values and Culture Indicators
- Dynamic and fast-paced environment.
- Opportunities for professional growth and development.
- Inclusive culture that values diversity and encourages collaboration.

#### 6. Specific Modifications to Recommend for Each Resume Section

**Personal Details:**
- Ensure contact information is up-to-date and includes professional profiles like LinkedIn.
- Mention "Lead Solution Architect & AI Innovator" in the email subject line as per application instructions.

**Professional Summary:**
- Highlight experience in leading complex enterprise projects and developing AI-driven solutions.
- Mention a strong track record in using RAG models and AI agents.
- Emphasize the ability to communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

**Technical Skills:**
- List Linux, Python, JSON, YAML prominently.
- Include skills related to enterprise applications, data systems, SAAS, Networking, and Authentication.
- Add any experience with Enterprise Data Catalog Products or Data Observability platforms.

**Experience:**
- Focus on roles that involved leading AI and data-driven projects.
- Highlight achievements in designing and implementing AI agent solutions.
- Include specific examples of successful POCs and deployments.

**Certifications:**
- List any relevant certifications in AI, data science, or solution architecture.
- If applicable, mention certifications related to compliance, privacy, and security of data.

**Education:**
- Ensure the degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field is clearly listed.
- Mention any advanced degrees or ongoing education relevant to AI and data solutions.

#### 7. Priority Ranking of Changes

- **High Importance:**
  - Update Professional Summary to align with key responsibilities and soft skills.
  - Highlight relevant Technical Skills, especially Linux, Python, JSON, YAML.
  - Emphasize Experience in leading AI-driven projects and successful POCs.

- **Medium Importance:**
  - Ensure Education section reflects relevant degrees.
  - Include Certifications that bolster qualifications for this role.

- **Low Importance:**
  - Adjust Personal Details to ensure all contact information is current and professional.
  - Tailor the format and style of the resume to ensure clarity and readability, using LaTeX commands effectively.

By implementing these recommendations, the resume will be better aligned with the job description, increasing the likelihood of capturing the attention of hiring managers for the Lead Solution Architect & AI Innovator position.
